title: Potato and Green Bean Soup
ingredients: ['330g fresh green beans, trimmed and cut into 2.5cm pieces', '1 tablespoon bicarbonate of soda', '235g peeled and diced potatoes', '75g melted butter', '80g diced onion', '35g bacon bits', '1 (295g) tin condensed cream of chicken soup', '700ml milk', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
